author: Wong Yi Hao
text:
Super run down, many members but management not doing bare minimum to keep the place in order. Don‚Äôt even provide resistance bands, don‚Äôt allow members to eat at the rest area.
Dumbbell area super disheveled, ground is uneven. Feedback more than 2 years ago but gym manager says ‚Äòupper management‚Äô has yet to approve the renovation.
Equipment is always rusty and dusty as well.
Do NOT sign with this gym.

author: Ernz Lim
text: Super duper crowded during peak hour, everything is being used, machines and equipment are the most rundown I‚Äôve ever seen at any AF gym. The weights are all without numberings and they can‚Äôt bare to replace them and resort to using a piece of paper to write the numbers on it.

author: Aileen Vitug
text:
Anytime Fitness NEX has been one of the most disappointing gym experiences I've ever had. Despite the 24/7 access being advertised as a major perk, the facility is often overcrowded, there's a queue in using the equipment during peak hours, making it nearly impossible to get a decent workout. Equipment is frequently out of order, and the machines that do work are either outdated or poorly maintained. Cleanliness is another major issue ‚Äì sweat-streaked benches, dirty floors  are regular occurrences.

The staff seems indifferent at best; they're hardly ever available for help and, when they are, they‚Äôre not very welcoming. I signed up and their staff, Grace, promised my partner 1 free month of membership for referring me. She assured us this even if we didn't ask for it but at the end she denied ever saying it, because we didn't have any proof, so we cannot also trust the staff keeping their word. I regret having signed up in this gym, I don't like being lied to.

Anytime Fitness NEX feels like a rip-off and far from the good experience they claim to provide. I‚Äôd recommend looking elsewhere if you‚Äôre serious about your fitness. Before making a mistake of signing up on this branch.

author: Roger Thomas Tan
text: Great place at NEX! Spacious with lots of machines to use! Other users are friendly and willing to share machines! Machines are new and in great working conditions! Lots of space to move about and doesn‚Äôt have the over crowded feel! Staffs are friendly! Changing is clean and spacious! Easily accessible with ample parking spaces at the mall!

author: Ai B
text:
The only time this isn‚Äôt crowded is when you go super early or super late.
Also, lots of people who thinks they own the machine by staying there, chitchatting for a long time. I have moved to another outlet since then

author: Derrick Tay
text: Equipment is old and its time to upgrade. Some handles on the equipment are already super worn off and makes me doubt about the safety performance. Surprise to see such worn out equipment!

author: Alan Ang
text: Just recently signed up with AF and went to quite a few branches for the past months. By far, the branch at Serangoon Nex is in the worst condition. They even need to use markers to indicate the weight of the dumbells. Extremely overcrowded most peak hours but that's understandable. That being said, it is well equipped for an all round workout. I would suggest the franchisee to make an effort to replace all the dumbells and update some of the equipments. IT DOESN'T COST MUCH! No photos, not worth taking any.

author: Beverly
text: Rusty broken dumbbells, old faulty machines, uneven flooring. Hasn‚Äôt changed for the 3+ years I‚Äôve been signed here. Unbelievable that the gym owner still hasn‚Äôt bothered with any renovations!

author: zulfadli rashid
text:
AF NEX used to be a good gym man. Now it's like an old race horse wanting to be put down.

Ive been a member since dunno how many years. The club urgently needs a makeover, new equipment, renovated toilets (with new everything).

These days, seems like management don't care about the facilities. What happened guys? I keep on seeing young ones training with crocs and not reracking their weights and nobody cares!

Maybe im just an old grumpy uncle, but come on lah, refresh this gym! Your long time members deserve it!

author: Dave Cheok
text:
So my home gym was transferred to AF Nex.
The pro about this gym is just location which is inside a mall.
The con's
1.Machine and and environment seems quite outdated as compared to other AF
2. Their staff hours is not accurate, on the sign says 11am but upon messaging them they infd it's 12pm?!
3. If you need to amend your account or anything, they do not accept over phone or email. You need to come down physically. Other AF would accept payments or amendments of your account via phone or email .

author: chris tan
text: Try coming and experience for yourself - equipments are REALLY old and rundown/rusty. Dumbbell rubbers are torn, handles ‚Äúbandaged‚Äù by tapes. Really a v bad experience, the management really ought to do some maintenance of the equipments‚Ä¶

author: Gary Ang
text: Gym is on the top floor on the mall! MRT is just all the way down, there's also carpark right beside the mall. Space of the gym is huge. Dumbbell are rusty from the sunlight, some smaller dumbbell are wrecked. But majority of the machines and barbell are in good condition. Lighting and music are decent.

author: Nic Neo
text: Poorly maintained dumbbells. Have been a long-time customer but the standard has gone down dramatically in this last year.

author: jj jj
text:
Poorly maintained equipment and facility. Machines are broken for weeks and months while dumbbells are old and chipped off, and dumbbells with rubber grips in the middle also have the rubber partially torn off and not replaced.
For $115 a month, we would expect more effort from the management to maintain the facilities and equipment.

author: anders ong
text: Condition of this gym is an absolute joke. All the dumbbells are rusty and disintegrating lol‚Ä¶ in need of a renovation

author: Rishanth kumar
text: In this place you are only welcomed while joining the gym, Paying the fees, signing the contract. After that they don't give a shit about you.......... even worse they automatically renew the contract once it's over and you won't be notified in any forms of communication and once you try to cancel that they will show the previous signed contract that shows they do whatever they want do with you and threaten you sending an email that they can take legal action against you if you are not going to pay the fees. These people are focused only for your ..............................MONEY, MONEY MONEY.................

author: BBS -
text: Poor maintenance, the equipment are so old and rusty. The dumbbell is ripped off and can't see the weight marking. The staff don't bother to at least put on something for the marking. The owner of this branch should change man. Seriously not worth it paying for them. Poor management.

author: Irene Tay
text: On 3 May 2022 - I'm a single mother who is an active gym membership of Anytime Fitness. I'm so disappointed that Anytime Fitness at Serangoon Nex chase us out of the gym because they do not allow me to bring along my 8yrs old daughter who only sit quietly at the resting area. Apparently, Anytime fitness at Nex outlet do not welcome "Active parents", the management should remove this piece of drawing on the pillar that states " Celebrate Active Parents". Since the outlet management and staff do not practice what they pitch.

author: Kai Yi .O
text: The worst toilet among all the Anytime Fitness locations I‚Äôve visited. Despite submitting multiple feedback, no improvements have been made. It‚Äôs difficult to find cloths and sanitiser to clean the equipment and benches after use. Even when you do manage to find a cloth, it‚Äôs damn dirty

author: Haroh Garcia
text: Filthy, poorly maintained equipment, and it smells. This franchise should be ashamed of the poor quality this branch provides.

author: richard tan
text: Extremely poor maintain gym. I just went there last week.Dumbells are damaged with no clear indication of dumbell weights. All dumbell weights are rusted so bad that they use black tape to cover up. Most machines are rusty. The gym is very run down., Rusted dumbells and rusty machines definately a user safety risk hazard. Seem like AF could not be bothered to care about equipment maintainance and safety. Simply a zero standard gym. Wonder outlet manager even know how to work or not. This outlet a disgrace to AF.

author: Lee Chrispher
text:
Spacious and equipments can be used without much time waiting as compare to peak timing (5-7 pm)

However, the weights seems very much wear off and broken till the weights has to be hand written and unorganized.

Generally still good to have a gym located in a mall along NEL

author: Josh Loke
text: Lousy gym. Dumbbells and mats are old and rusty, yet the gym owner refuses to replace them

author: Wilven Rey Hiteroza
text: Place is very convenient right above mrt and inside the mall, spacious and have lots of equpment but can be very busy and crowded, u have to wait to use some equipment as demand is high. The place amd equipment looks a bit old but functional! Its clean too. I hope theres a charging station

author: Minh Nguyen Le
text:
Worst AF in Singapore I have ever been to. Staffs are unfriendly, not helpful and don‚Äôt look very healthy and fit ( I would never hire them to coach me ). Equipments are old and rusty.
I was 32 weeks pregnant and tried to hit the gym whenever I feel like I can. My mind is all over the place and my feet were swelling. In addition, I planned to just training my core with very light dumbbells at the stretching area that day. Therefore the last thing I want to do is training in my small, tight pair of converse shoes. It was fine with staffs at other AF because I mostly just stretch and exercise with yoga mat at the designated areas and only use light dumbbells for 1 exercises. The staff approached me and ask me to leave if I don‚Äôt have any cover shoes. What a horrible experience when you are trying to exercise while being pregnant! I didn‚Äôt let that ruins my exercise routine. I just go downstairs and buy me an another comfortable and casual pair of cover shoes and finished my exercises. I was too tired of my pregnancy to deal with the service yet.
In summary , I don‚Äôt think I will be back or purchase any services there any rime soon since there are a lot of choices around that areas. Serangoon garden, or upper Serangoon or Lorong Chuan.
Why putting myself in a dark cold, old and rusty, unfriendly and not supportive environment especially when I am a pregnant woman in my last trimester.

author: Spy Account
text: This gym is alright, to those asking for a 5 stars service (Staff to smile at you, 100% new equipment, etc) then freaking go to a higher end gym? (PURE Fitness, Virgin Active, etc) , already pay so little for a gym membership still want to yap so much.

author: Shannon Lim
text:
been here for quite sometime and have always been wearing covered shoes, but one day i decided to drop by before work to do some upper body weights work out but this staff called jack confronted me for wearing boots. saying it‚Äôs ‚Äúnot sport shoes‚Äù i understand it‚Äôs a gym but what i don‚Äôt understand is converse, vans or other casual covered shoes are allowed.

this boots im wearing covers my feet so well, it basically protects all 10 toes. the problem is not me getting told to wear sport shoes but he speaks in this very condescending tone‚Äîflat out rude.

i never had issues with covered shoes when visiting other AF, and staff in other outlets are always super nice, friendly and welcoming.

MAIN MESSAGE: It doesn‚Äôt hurt to say nicely and be kinder to people. PSA : equipments are old and rusty.

author: Ashok Kumar J
text:
Great mixtures of workout equipment‚Äôs ! Can follow programme if in the gym before 7:30 AM.

Be aware: if you want to discontinue, you may need to remind several times and get the confirmation else you‚Äôll be charged till this closed. Exp. I was charged on my credit card for 6 long months without being informed me. Wasn‚Äôt happy hence not repeating my membership any part of the world.

author: MillenialDoc
text: They really got to stop playing the continuous loop of Imagine Dragons, Avicii and Maroon 5, as if they have no other songs available. These 3 are literally the only artists in the loop. It‚Äôs so darn annoying to be listening to the same music every time I visit this outlet.

author: Simin Chen
text: I enjoy the atmosphere here more than other outlets since I sign up here and it‚Äôs my home gym. It‚Äôs spacious and the facilities are great.

author: Li Hung Pao
text: Have been a regular since AF opened a branch at NEX mall. Nothing to complain about yet there is also nothing to ra ra about too

author: Deborah Guo
text:
Had some key fob issues which were completely my bad, so appreciate Hakim and Richard going out of their way to assist me with my entry into the club!

Been coming to this branch occasionally over the years and I must say equipment are pretty decently maintained considering how long the gym has been around. Plenty of racks too! Thanks again guys for the seamless experience :)

author: Secret ang Name ko
text: Been going to this gym for 3yrs now and what i like about this gym, that is spacious and near my house. One thing i don't like about it is that all the machine and equipment are are too old and some of them are always under maintenance for so many months now and cannot be used. When i saw some of new AF gyms outlet they have some new machine that this branch don't have. You will only enjoy this gym if you are staying near.

author: Emmanuel Goh
text:
been to many AF (the tampines central one is great - there‚Äôs ALWAYS someone who waves you in and the staff there make an effort to keep the place safe and welcoming).

the staff at Nex leave much to be desired - every interaction is unpleasant and they do little to create any type of community/culture. clearly they‚Äôre here to do the bare minimum and it shows. the upkeep of the place is horrendous (look at the tons of other reviews pointing out faulty parts, rusty weights, etc etc), and the layout of machines/benches is quite thoughtless wrt maximising an easily overcrowded space.

author: Cassandra Goh
text:
Staff/PTs are unhelpful and unfriendly.

Asked one of the PTs for help with adjusting one of the machines and he simply told me that ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt manage this area of the gym hence I don‚Äôt know and anyways most people don‚Äôt need adjusting of this machine‚Äù. AF please make sure your PTs are at the very least competent to help members with the machines?? This is quite ridiculous imo.

On another note, staff at the front desk is not friendly at all (as many other reviewers have noted) and do not even bother to say hi/acknowledge members who are entering (unlike other AFs).

I strongly believe that people make up the gym community and for this AF, you‚Äôre way better off asking the regulars for help than the supposedly trained staff.

author: Justin Woo
text:
Huge and spacious gym ‚Äî high ceiling clearance makes for a less claustrophobic environment despite the huge variety of machines and free weights.

Toilets and bag areas are generally well cleaned even during non-staffed hours. Good security as well (key fob access system), with CCTV monitoring the bag areas.

There are also plenty of protein shakes and bars available for purchase via vending machines.

Very convenient location, located at the rooftop of NEX which is connected to Serangoon MRT via several entry points, so you won‚Äôt ever have the excuse of skipping a workout because it‚Äôs raining (unfortunately?).

author: Maixmus Aurelius
text: Worst Anytime in Singapore, floor mats dented in the free weights area, no one bother to put up a caution sign on it, poorly maintained machine, weights out of of place, they have 5 staffs at the front door checking for towel, yet no one bother to walk around the gym to do basic maintenance and checking. The only thing good is the location

author: Bryce Lim
text:
The service here for membership is preposterous. The staff whatsapped me the rates, and when I went down physically they told me the rates and both were the same: it was 12 or 18 monthly and the rates were paid monthly, but if you pay in lump sum you will get 1 month free. However in the end, when I was about to confirm they told me only lump sum option available (in a take it or leave it manner) and no reply after I asked why the offer was different from the original conversations I had.
How can you offer different prices at different times at your whimsy and as a customer I just find the service to be terrible. Will not sign up with this gym and found a much better gym elsewhere. My guess is that they have enough capacity for members and don‚Äôt value new members hence the treatment.

author: Calvin Chan
text: Dont even have hair dryer for their shower facilities

author: Joel Gwey
text:
I have been a member at Anytime Fitness Nex for a while now, and while I appreciate its convenient location, I must say that the overall condition of the gym could use some improvement.

One of the main issues I have noticed is the maintenance of the equipment. Many of the dumbbells and machines show signs of rust, which is not only unsightly but also raises concerns about their durability and safety. Additionally, the deadlift platforms have noticeable dents, which can affect the proper execution of exercises.

Another area that needs attention is the air conditioning system. The gym tends to be excessively humid, making each session more uncomfortable than it should be. I find myself breaking out in sweat excessively, which hampers my workout experience. Adequate air ventilation would greatly alleviate this issue.

Furthermore, the ventilation in the men's restroom leaves much to be desired. There is a persistent unpleasant smell that seems to linger, making it an unpleasant experience for users. Addressing this issue would greatly improve the overall hygiene and comfort of the facilities.

Considering my experiences at other Anytime Fitness locations, I believe Anytime Fitness Nex could benefit from upgrading their equipment to meet the standards found at other branches. Members deserve well-maintained and modern equipment to enhance their workouts.

I hope that management takes these concerns into consideration and makes the necessary improvements to create a more enjoyable environment for all members.

author: Jang Chue
text:
Disappointed in the upkeep of this place .. promoting to get more members when efforts to take care of current members are way below par to day the least.

Uneven flooring - safety hazard.
Deadlift platform - many holes and most screws are loose
Dumbbells - plastic and rubber parts already fallen off.

author: Bear Melon
text:
Gym space 4
Cleanses 3
Machine variation 3
Maintenance 3
Access 4 (Serangoon MRT)

Machine LifeFittness
5 Racks
Good for Legs and free

Very busy on weekends

author: strider 168
text: Staff are rude. Where i'm from AF has some towels for cleaning the equipment. Staff rudely came at me and told that i have to bring myself to clean their equipment. Disgusting behavior

author: katia
text: It‚Äôs spacious and would be so good if the equipment wasn‚Äôt so old. I think it‚Äôs time for an update. Humbly.

author: Duncan Lim
text: Absolutely the worse AF! Cannot manually scan in if we forget to bring key fob. Literallly the only AF franchise doing this nonsense. Equipment is poorly maintained too. Pls get your membership else where. Serangoon NEX mall is already difficult a place to get a parking lot for your car, and when u finally found a lot and parked and walked all the way to the gym to find you left your key fob at home, they refuse to let u in. Seriously, it is already so hard to squeeze out time to gym, and they have to make things even harder.

author: Terence chin
text:
As AF gym member for years, I didn't even ask for a single refund during the pandemic period but just continue paying for monthly fee as I do understand the situation was not easy for everyone.

The payment didn't went through for some reason eventhough I didn't change my card. When I realised the email and submitted the form to change the credit card for my overdue payment. They still replied to my email saying that they will not accept because I reply after the deadline.

Truly "Great service" I have from Hakim & Dwi and perhaps I should have ask for the few months refund during the pandemic period.

You don't have to expect things will change by giving feedback here as most of the review here were not attended.

author: Joyce A.
text:
rarely leave reviews but i feel this team deserves one!!

incredibly grateful to the Anytime Fitness Nex team. signed up with them through Richard and started my fresh gym journey in Aug 2022. have been having continuous PT sessions with Jack and it really made my gymming a million times more enjoyable. for someone who has never had proper gym experience, not only did Jack helped boost my confidence in gymming, but made me realise that it's really okay to have down times sometimes and i shouldn't hate myself for it üò≠ on top of the entire AF Nex team who has been super friendly and nice, special shout out to Hakim and Zul!! ü´∂üèª this gym's team has rly made me feel so comfortable and unafraid to gym alone üò© forever thankful ü•π

and extra credit: they actually put in the effort to fix the peeling leather/material of gym equips and the actual mechanisms if they break. just unfortunate that sometimes it might take a bit longer due to the shipping, but that's ok laaaa; can use other equipments whaaat ü§üüèº

author: Aryan Thakur
text: The weights are kept randomly and can be hard to find. Some of the machines have rust on them. The staff is rather unpleasent. Been to a few anytime fitness clubs, NEX mall was by far the least pleasing.

author: Sharon Lau
text: Equipments were very rusty, dumbbells were scattered everywhere. Staffs were unfriendly as well. Most run down Anytime I‚Äôve been to. Poorly maintained

author: Ronneil Calinao
text: My friend want to join me to workout in AF NEX as guess so he can decide whether to choose AF. We texted the staff and asked for a time to come and he agreed. We came but the staff did not turn up!!! Wasted time. Didn‚Äôt even bother to reply or return call back!!!! Hope he read this. üëä ‚Ä¶

author: V Kartish james
text: Worst ever Anytime Fitness in singapore went there earlier today customer service is so baaaadddd been a member of Anytime fitness for 5yrs plus and so far this is the worst outlet ever. Staff there was soo rude and not practical at all wanted me to leave the gym just because i dindt have towel. Soo stupid of them and even said they will cal security if i don't leave hahahah what a experience here. They told me ok for this time nvm next time must bring i said ok noted but as soon as i started they kept on coming to me and irritating me an kept on coming and wanted me to talk to the manager through the phone. They gave five mins but 1min plus they already giving another problem as you said at first for today only will be excused should have kept to yiur woed and not chase me from the gym.

author: Josh Loke
text: A lot of broken, old, rusty equipment. Many dumbbell markings are gone, assisted dips machine has been spoilt for 2 weeks, only 1 EZ bar.

author: Yacine Lim
text: Atrocious experience! Went there 3 times and EACH AND EVERYTIME there is no staff present and I usually ended up waited at least 15 minutes just for someone to show up. Forgot to ask for his name but the Chinese guy at the reception is pretty damn condescending and rude. Have the intention of signing up but whatever good impression that I have is completely gone! If they think Anytime is a big name and keep on providing this kind of awful service attitude then I am pretty sure this outlet's business will definitely dwindle. The only it has going for it is the location. Look at their reviews, whoever gave a bad review are all complaining about their staffs' horrendous attitude!

author: Kyle Reynolds
text: Poorly maintained. Needs renovation. Equipment seems like it‚Äôs nearly as old as I am. Not clean. Also lack of benches at dumbell rack.

author: Raymond Goh
text:
Pros :
- The equipments are well maintained.
- The equipments are are good enough to cover your Push/ Pull/ Legs day.
- Located in nex where just above the MRT station.

Cons :
- It‚Äôs always crowded especially the after-work hour.

author: Pieter Roeloffs
text:
Staff is friendly but gym is way too expensive. They have to abide by nonsense rules they themselves install.
Say they‚Äôre expat friendly but this not the case at all. The whole system of applying for a longer membership is just so they can make more money. A member who is just applying for 1 month is not more expensive at all. Very unhappy with the franchise which in my opinion is not so customer friendly as they advertise.

author: Utkole M
text:
Worst customer experience, the franchise and the front office desk think very highly of themselves. Not bothered to return messages and share details. I went twice and waited for 20-30 mins, I then went in (someone else also waiting in let me in) and figured out everyone was sitting in a room, chit-chating with complete disregard to everyone standing outside waiting for the front office desk employee. They are not clear to explain anything and force you to join a package that suits the front office guy. The follow questions had a lead time of 1 day!(Imagine a sales guy taking 1 day to respond to potential new customer query, they are just not interested in your business)

In the end, imagine if they have such an attitude even before you become a member what will happen when you actually become their  member.
Stay away from Anytime Fitness Nex!

author: marcus soh
text: Really dirty and overall super poorly maintained gym, just save yourself the trip. Would rather go to Bishan, Amk south or serangoon gardens

author: Khairul Ariffin
text: Gym staff have no empthany regarding gym members. Can't even make an exception due to no key fob which they can't even verify if you are a paying member or not. Unlike other AF.

author: LC LY
text: I would give a 4-star review for the location, spaciousness, and facility, but the management (compared to all other friendly outlets) is so lousy that I won't bother to even come back. The staffs are rude. The boss is worse. üëé ‚Ä¶

author: senthilvel vedachalam
text: It values our time that‚Äôs why they arranged the working hours of the gym, so that we can work out in our convenient time. Well equipped and well experienced trainers, very good ambience and nice place to join. Really worth for money.

author: Daney Du
text: Most terrible staff ever seen. Been a member for nearly 10 yrs, transfered from other outlet due to relocation. So far the worst experience ever. Staff was rude and unprofessional.

author: K Daron
text:
One of the best anytime fitness gym in Singapore mainly due to its size and the range of equipment.

They have a total of 4 power racks (2 have deadlift platform) and 2 deadlift platform.

Downside is that the toilets are quite dirty and most of the time you have to queue up (Peak hour)

Very crowded during their peak hour (weekdays 6pm+)

author: Jenny Lee
text: This is the most spacious outlet that AF has. Lots of machines and weights too, so you're less likely have to wait for your turn. Some of the plates are quite hard to grab though, as there is no "handles".

author: Engr Nigel Paulryan
text: Staff are downright RUDE, unhelpful, unprofessional. Not sure where the arrogance is coming from is it from the unpleasant physical appearance or from the vocational ITE certs I totally have no idea. Anyway, what kind of customer service can u expect from an average salary staff (I'm not trying to say underpaid hahaha -roll eyes). Besides there must be a reason why their Facebook page has no ratings available. Cannot be compared to fitness first not even the smallest gyms in SG. You don't believe me? Check out other member reviews about POOR Customer service. If I'm the owner of would have change my staff coz it would hurt my business as there's plenty of gyms in SG

author: WanderWithWit
text: Good location, big gym but equipments are mostly very old and poorly maintained. It is always crowded at any point in the day and so it is very difficult to train well.

author: Terence Sim
text:
Walked past
Never went in.
Looks almost like any other Anytime Fitness outlet in Singapore
No originality.
Very competitive business in Singapore with fitness outlets everywhere.
Not sure if they can survive though.
Highly recommend to do online marketing to get leads.
Rental must be expensive.

author: Daniel Chen
text: The staff attended to me was great but I really don't understand how one of the owner will reject a joining for 18 months sign up membership. I guess maybe they have too many members already.

author: Nikita Gn Angela
text:
1. Warm, friendly and helpful staff (Sally & Ali)
2. QR Code installed on every exercise equipment. One just has to download app to view how to use the equipment properly.
3. Spacious & clean
4. Anytime Fitness' member is recognised worldwide. Just remember to bring your keyfob issued by the gym. Now...how cool is that!
5. Package is reasonable and fee is deducted monthly.
6. There's even a "Call for HELP" corner in case of any Emergency.

One of the best gyms for me, todate.

author: daniel k
text: Over-earnest and inflexible staff when it comes to regulation. Go to this gym if you like feeling like you‚Äôre back in school being bossed around by prefects. Poor response attitude when a customer tries to register a complaint

author: Zosi
text: Got rejected from going into the gym as i was not on the list of ‚Äúnex anytime fitness members‚Äù. Whereas on anytime fitness website, it did mention that anytime fitness members are free to visit any global gyms at ease ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è This contradicts the company‚Äôs rules and having a namelist of those allowed to use Nex‚Äôs gym is ridiculous!! Need to report to HQ abt it

author: Arice Chan
text: Bad service, receptionist extremely rude, was there to check for packages available and rates, during the whole process she just focus on texting with her mobile and answer questions with "mmm.", "arh.", "ya.". am in service line as well, wonder how these kind of staff can survive and how their management evaluate their staffs' performance.

author: Rentnosaur Workspace
text: I tried to request an invoice for my monthly membership fee, but was told by the management that the invoice costs a bloody fee of $10 per request. Good game, well played! üëç ‚Ä¶

author: Jarrett Goh
text:
Requested for my monthly receipt from AF NEX, and I am told to pay $10 for it because "As official receipts are manually created by us, there will be an admin fee of $10 per receipt."

This is ridiculous and no customers should be paying for their own receipt.

author: Lee Zhen Quan
text: Wanted to come on here to say that the staff is so rude and bad, then i found out that i wasn‚Äôt the only one experiencing this lol literally all the reviews are about how bad and rude the staff here are, been to many AF outlets in SG but this is the only outlet i had issues with the staffs‚Äô attitude and jst had to write a review about it smh ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

author: Eva
text: Creepy, poorly maintained compared to other gyms in area (NTP, Gardens, Kovan) - staff were also impolite to me

author: Jun Shiong
text: Arrogant staffs thinking they owns the gym and I'm not surprised when the boss himself displays similar traits which I guess it is one of their company motto? How about they change the name of the gym to arrogant fitness? I mean so what if one of you staff have many followers? So being a so called online celebrity allows you to have a condescending attitude to people? Face palm...

author: M Ng
text:
Quite disappointed with their rigid rules
...
Refused entry without keyfob even if I'm a bona fide member. I had my IC and that would not do...as only key fob is accepted. So based on their logic I can pass the fob to any person
